mapper.select: select count(*) totalNumber,ROUND(SUM(real_pay_money),2) totalMoney from daifa_trade where create_time >=#{startTime} and create_time <=#{endTime}

SELECT ROUND( sum( t3.express_fee + t3.order_fee ), 2 ) sendMoney, sum(t3.goods_num) sendNumber FROM ( SELECT t1.express_fee, sum( t2.single_pi_price + t2.total_service_fee ) order_fee, sum(t2.goods_num) goods_num FROM ( SELECT df_trade_id, express_fee FROM daifa_trade WHERE send_time >=#{startTime} and send_time <=#{endTime} ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT df_trade_id, goods_num, single_pi_price, total_service_fee FROM daifa_order WHERE take_goods_status = 1 AND refund_status = 0 AND order_status = 3 ) t2 ON t1.df_trade_id = t2.df_trade_id GROUP BY t1.df_trade_id ) t3
